text: 4.23: Stt 18.10-14; Ro 9.7-9; Hi 11.11Mba ŋaara khɨna mbui mbik tegi kam, ana nza gumgi gu mbigi nza wari ga rɨgap tari ti tɨva muuŋgiap hɨgi. Mba ana muuŋ gɨrgɨr Sara tegi kam, ana Fhe Bakɨme fhum khaŋ Abraham ga suaŋgi, “Ndun muuŋ gɨrgɨr Sara, ana ndu gon kama tegɨrga.” Mba tar mba kameŋ zɨn vugap hɨgi.
